CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(animalos__End_Date_Time__c), TODAY() - DATEVALUE(animalos__Start_Date_Time__c), IF(OR(DATEVALUE(animalos__End_Date_Time__c) = DATEVALUE(animalos__Start_Date_Time__c), DATEVALUE(animalos__Start_Date_Time__c) = TODAY()), 1, DATEVALUE(animalos__End_Date_Time__c) - DATEVALUE(animalos__Start_Date_Time__c)))
CustomField.label: Total Time (Days)
